features: Our daily face moisturizer hydration hero, Daydreamer blends an array of our favorite organic hydrators and botanicals. An oil free facial moisturizer.

For all skin types. A daily face lotion that intensely hydrates (thank you, hyaluronic acid) without any greasy residue. Rosehip oil and peptides provide anti-aging face moisturizer effects. Non-Comedogenic.

Key natural & organic ingredients include Vitamin E, Hyaluronic Acid, Rosehip Oil, and Borage Seed Oil. Cruelty free. A fragrance free organic face moisturizer. Made in USA with globally sourced ingredients.

We're all about providing truth and clarity in natural, effective skincare. In a crowded market with over-hyped “miracle ingredients”, we found most ingredients don't produce results. We drilled down to 8 key ingredients that generated the majority of the benefits for your skin: Our "Eight Saints".
Worry Free Return Policy: Try Eight Saints organic face moisturizer for women worry free with our 30 day return policy. If a product doesn't work for you, contact us and we'll happily refund you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Daydreamer Smoothing Moisturizer Our daily hydration hero, Daydreamer blends an array of our favorite organic oils and botanicals with plenty of hyaluronic acid for its over 1,000 times moisture-binding ability. Organic shea butter locks in hydration with the same properties as the natural moisturizer produced by the skin's sebaceous glands. Jojoba oil, also high in biological compatibility, increases microcirculation and soothes irritation. Combining these deeply hydrating ingredients ensures your moisture levels will remain balanced, even in extreme weather conditions. A citrus blend extract gives you a morning boost for an uplifting start to your day - when you focus on the good, the good gets better!
Why You Need It Hyaluronic acid increases moisture for 24 hours, while emollients seal it inGentle for use throughout the daySoothing organic formulaInfusion of citrus adds refreshing scent

Ingredient Highlights Vitamin E Stops pollution from prematurely aging skin by neutralizing free radicals. Botanical Hyaluronic Acid This moisture-binding powerhouse keeps skin plump and super hydrated. Cocoa Seed Butter Extracted during the process of making chocolate, this natural ingredient slows the loss of water from the skin by forming a barrier on the skin's surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizer with fantastic results almost immediately!!!
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer has become a go to in our house - it's very lightweight, feels very refreshing and hydrating and has a mild but not overpowering scent. I've noticed my skin becoming softer, smoother and more vibrant after using this after even the first use but even more as time is going on. You also only need a little bit to cover your full face, so this tube has gone a long way. I also really like that it’s not greasy or so thick that it lingers on your face after putting it on, it dries quickly and feels great. It's a staple now and can’t wait to try more from the brand !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and Non-Greasy Moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a non-greasy, light moisturizer and I found it in this product. It's rich and creamy right from the tube but smooths on and absorbs into the skin with ease. The scent is a pleasant, natural citrus scent. I like that it provides instant moisturizing as soon as I apply it but with the hyaluronic acid content, it also gives a bonus of longer-term results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST MOISTURIZER FOR COMBO-OILY SKIN
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for a few weeks now as my day time moisturizer. It has a smooth, lovely texture and is light and is not at all greasy. It absorbs quickly and has a pleasant fragrance. My skin feels hydrated, soft and smooth. Make-up goes on smoothly. No pilling. I use this as my daytime moisturizer and another Eight Saints product, Up the Anti, at night, which I highly suggest you try also. I like the fact that it contains natural ingredients and is cruelty-free. So glad I discovered this product line. I highly recommend this for those with combination to oily skin. Price point is very reasonable too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect morning moisturizer, it is great alone or wearing under makeup. My skin has been so dry this winter and after just the first use my skin instantly felt more hydrated, smooth and supple. After a couple weeks my skin looks more even and refreshed. I love that it is so moisturizing but isn’t greasy or makes me feel clogged and the scent is so refreshing! I have sensitive skin and tend to be prone to breakouts and have yet to have any purging or breakouts from the switch which I’m so pleased because I desperately needed a hydrating cream fast without trial and error. Do yourself a favor and get it, you won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absorbs quickly, hydrating and smells divine
reviews.reviewText: I was introduced to Eight Saints via their “discovery” kit that had samples of most of their products. I liked this moisturizer enough to purchase the full sized version.For context, here’s some info about my skin: very dry but acne prone, fine lines, acne scars, age is 46.The first thing you’ll notice is the smell, which is light and divine! I usually use in scented or lightly scented skin products only and this is perfect. Citrus hints.It goes on smoothly and takes a minute or two to absorb, but isn’t sticky at all.I will let it set before applying makeup.While it isn’t overly thick, it does a great job at calming my dry skin and making it feel smooth and moisturized. So much so that sometimes I use this at night rather than a heavier cream because it works that well. I haven’t experienced breakouts using this! The quest to find a moisturizer that is hydrating and calming enough for my very dry skin but doesn’t clog my pores and aggravate breakouts is nearly impossible. I think (hope!) I’ve found my answer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Start the Day with a Little Luxury
reviews.reviewText: What a wonderful daytime moisturizer! This is the perfect weight and texture - smooth and creamy, but also light and not oily. It has a clean, light citrus-y scent. The ingredients are MVPs, too - hyaluronic acid, vitamin E and antioxidants. My skin feels so soft and smooth when I use this. I love all Eight Saints products, but this one stands out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this face moisturizer for a month now and I am very impressed with the results. It has a light and non-greasy texture that absorbs quickly into the skin. It leaves my face feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated. It also has a subtle and pleasant fragrance that is not overpowering.It does not cause any irritation. It also contains natural ingredients that nourish and protect my face. It is cruelty-free, which is a big plus for me.I would highly recommend this face moisturizer to anyone looking for a silky-smooth and affordable product. It is definitely worth every penny. It is one of the best moisturizers I have ever used and I will continue to use it for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars In love with it ❤️
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this face cream for a week now and I love it. It is really hydrating and makes my face look and feel so soft and dewy. I like that it is not greasy and is lightweight, yet hydrating as I have sensitive skin that’s prone to breakouts. Also, the fragrance is incredibly light which is hard to find these days in face creams. I am amazed at how quickly the products gets absorbed and makes my skin feel very smooth. So happy that I can now get the same luxury product as the expensive high end ones without spending big bucks. Recommend it 💯
